description.english: You've dipped your toes in! Playtime: 1 hour.

You've hit your stride! Playtime: 4 hours.
You're halfway to mastery. Playtime: 5 hours.
You're in it for the long haul. Playtime: 6 hours.
Nothing can stop you now. Playtime: 7 hours.
You've reached peak dedication. Playtime: 8 hours.
